Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 36th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Jacky Armenguer (BRO)...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 4/4/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2015, hitting .348 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Injured on 5/26/2015 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2016, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 7/26/2016...
9/1/2016: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $14,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2017, hitting .391 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2017, hitting .333 with 6 HR, 24 RBI...
Injured on 6/28/2017 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 4/20/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2018, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 15 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2018, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 4/10/2019 with a Broken Foot, out for 9 weeks...
Injured on 7/7/2019 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2020, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 6/20/2020 (Going to CHI: 2B Robert Serrano, LF Mark Starr, P Luis Cabello, P Lesley Simoneau, 1B Andres Armendariz. Going to NY: 2B John James, RF Kevin McGuire)
...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/8/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $14,500,000 per year...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 6/30/2021 (Going to NY: LF Stephen Gullion, RF Michael Bitner. Going to CHI: P Jeffrey Horne, 2B John James, 3B Fausto Ocerin)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/8/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
